    level="1"
    right="Feat 4"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Versatile Signature](/Feats.aspx?ID=4595) <actions string="" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Bard" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=546" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

**Source** [Player Core](/Sources.aspx?ID=216) pg. 103 <sup>2.0</sup>

**Prerequisites**
[polymath muse](/Muses.aspx?ID=3)

</column>

---

While most bards are known for certain signature performances and spells, you’re always tweaking your available repertoire. When you make your [daily preparations](/Rules.aspx?ID=2575), you can change one of your signature spells to a different spell of that rank from your repertoire.
name: Versatile Signature
